alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Harnett; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 5:25PM EDT until July 01 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Harnett County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Lee County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Durham County in central North Carolina... Eastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 525 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chapel Hill to 7 miles south of Carrboro to near Pittsboro, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Sanford, Pittsboro, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Angier, Apex and Holly Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
